item.title: Siemens Advantage Navigator Energy & Sustainability

item.title: Siemens Capital
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Only affected if Teamcenter integration feature is used. Currently no remediation is available. Find detailed mitigations steps at:Mitigations Link; See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.

item.title: Siemens Cerberus DMS
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Resources Resource Link source https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Workaround CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the class-path. Detailed instructions are available here.

item.title: Siemens Comos Desktop App
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Resources Resource Link source https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-44228: Vulnerable CISAGov Currently no remediation is available. Uninstall “Teamcenter Client Communication System (TCSS)” or block both incoming and outgoing connections between the system and the Internet.

item.title: Siemens Desigo CC
item.description: Vendor Resources Resource Link Siemens Advisory - SSA-661257: Apache Log4j Vulnerabilities https://cert-portal.siemens.com/productcert/pdf/ssa-661247.pdf Community Notes Source Note CISAGov Remove the JndiLookup class from the class-path. Detailed instructions are available here. See further recommendations from Siemens Advisory SSA-661257 CISAGov Last Update: 12/18/2021 Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-18 19:49:41 CISAGov Updated communityVulnerable.
